original_text: In the sixth year, in the sixth month on the fifth day, while I was sitting in my house and the elders of Judah were sitting before me, the hand of the Sovereign Lord came on me there.
korean_text: 여섯째 해 여섯째 달 초닷새에 나는 집에 앉았고 유다의 장로들은 내 앞에 앉아 있는데 주 여호와의 권능이 거기에서 내게 내리기로

sentences.original_text: while I was sitting in my house
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 집에 앉아 있을 때

sentences.original_text: and the elders of Judah were sitting before me
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 장로들이 내 앞에 앉아 있을 때

sentences.original_text: the hand of the Sovereign Lord came on me there
sentences.korean_translation: 주권자이신 주의 손이 그곳에서 내게 임하니라
